title: Anticipazione patch 8.1

embed.description: League of Legends' next big content patch is 8.1, introducing the 2018 season, as well as a host of balance and bug fixes. So far, they include changes to Graves and Cassiopeia, as well as several changes around the Forbidden Idol item lines. Have a look below for all the information we've got, straight from the PBE.

body:
Grasp of the Undying - changed

No longer deals bonus damage.
Heal increased to 3% from 2%.
Changed to [grants you bonus AD/AP for 10s, stacking] from [permanently increased your health by 5].
Adaptive AD or AP is equal to 1% or 1.6% of your max health, respectively.
Ranged champions no longer gain 2 permanent health.

Partiamo dalle cose succose

Il cambio del grasp rida vita a tutti quei champ che giocavano di AA e giocavano mezzi tank (brusier e jujji in primis)
Unito con il buff a olaf, a raast (buff diretto alle stats base), potrebbero smuovere il meta della jung e della top

Della top vedremo campioni che era un po che erano in calo come darius, illaoi e costringerà alcune vanguard andranno di scosse dell assestamento

P.s. buff all idra titanica


Pareri imprrssioni idee?
